desc: Feeling stressed? Distracted? Anxious? Focus Box uses proven research and our own tested framework to curate a monthly subscription box that supports you to grow your focus and live a better life.

layout.text: Anxiety? Stress? Sleeplessness? Do you know you're not doing your best work? Or are you struggling to unwind? The Focus Box gives you proven tools to fix your focus through Better Sleep, Better Thinking, and Better Living. First-time Box users reported an extra 1 hour of free time each day. How is this possible?
